General.Name: Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co Ltd
General.Description: Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd engages in the manufacturing and sale of building materials, and cement and cement clinker products in China. The company offers dry powder mortar; clinker, concrete, sand and gravel aggregates, and other building materials; and oil well special cement, which are used in railways, highways, airports, water conservancy projects, oil wells, and other infrastructure or large-scale heavy industrial facilities projects, as well as urban real estate development and construction, and rural markets. It also engages in the mineral resource mining; power generation; nonmetallic mining and dressing; processing and sale of stones; import and export business; manufacture and sale of equipment for environmental protection; waste heat and waste pressure power generation; real estate development; asset management; property management; and equity investment and venture capital business. In addition, the company is involved in the technical development and technical consultation of energy-saving and environmental protection equipment; waste utilization and solid waste treatment, E-commerce technology consulting and development, and solar energy generation activities; co-processing solid waste systems with cement production line; and provision of logistics and transportation services. The company was formerly known as Baiyin Copper Commercial Building (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd in April 2013. Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd was founded in 1978 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Hui  Qu
